entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers. Snow level 1200 metres lowering to valley bottom late this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 30%
